metadata.inclusion:
1. Plug the valve control in within 3 feet of your location
2. Press the red power button on the valve control THREE times quickly
3. The LED indicator will confirm successful inclusion
metadata.exclusion:
1. Plug the valve control in within 3 feet of your location
2. Press the red power button on the valve control THREE times quickly
3. The LED indicator will confirm successful exclusion
metadata.reset: Press and hold the red power button for 10 seconds. The LED indicator on the device will flash to indicate successful reset.
